personalDescription.title: Personal Description
personalDescription.subtitle: My Journey to Cardiology
personalDescription.content: I successfully completed my medical studies at the University in Tehran. During my studies, I wrote an outstanding doctoral thesis that further ignited my passion for cardiology. After a brief period of work in Iran, I decided to emigrate to Germany to continue my specialist training in cardiology. I completed my specialist training in renowned clinics under the guidance of highly respected and well-known cardiologists in Germany.

highlights.educationDesc: Successfully completed with outstanding doctoral thesis
highlights.specializationDesc: In renowned clinics under respected cardiologists

detailed_journey.point1: I successfully completed my medical studies at the University in Tehran.
detailed_journey.point2: During my studies, I wrote an outstanding doctoral thesis that further ignited my passion for cardiology.
detailed_journey.point3: After a brief period of work in Iran, I decided to emigrate to Germany to continue my specialist training in cardiology.
detailed_journey.point4: I completed my specialist training in renowned clinics under the guidance of highly respected and well-known cardiologists in Germany.
detailed_journey.point5: Since January 2018, I have been working as a specialist in cardiology and dedicate myself with devotion to my patients.
detailed_journey.point6: During my specialist training, I additionally acquired comprehensive training in cardiac imaging, including cardiac CT and cardiac MRI.
detailed_journey.point7: I independently performed a variety of examinations and obtained certification from the German Society of Cardiology for performing cardiac MRI examinations.
detailed_journey.point8: Subsequently, I completed specialized training in the field of invasive cardiology and PTCA.
detailed_journey.point9: As a senior physician in the hospital, I was responsible for treating emergencies such as heart attacks and severe calcification of the coronary arteries.
detailed_journey.point10: To face further challenges, I specialized in the treatment of cardiac arrhythmias.
detailed_journey.point11: Over the years, I have gained valuable experience and now master the invasive treatment of cardiac arrhythmias (ablations) as well as the implantation of pacemakers and ICD devices.

personalDescription.page_description: Learn more about the career and qualifications of Dr. Faraz Farmahini, Specialist in Cardiology.
